weekly picks (Jul 3 week 2024)

Posted on July 15, 2024 in 2024jul,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 Jul 3rd week collection

  1. s41467-024-50211-5 Large-scale 2D heterostructures from hydrogen-bonded organic frameworks and graphene with distinct Dirac and flat bands (Nature Communications)

  2. s41567-024-02552-7 Terahertz spectroscopy of collective charge density wave dynamics at the atomic scale (Nature Physics)

  3. s41563-024-01914-z Van Hove annihilation and nematic instability on a kagome lattice (Nature Materials)

  4. 2407.08794v1 Exciton condensation driven by bound states of Green’s functions zeros (arXiv)

  5. 2407.08920v1 Chern Bands’ Optimally Localized Wannier Functions and Fractional Chern Insulators (arXiv)

  6. 2407.08998v1 Chiral orbital texture in nonlinear electrical conduction (arXiv)

  7. 2407.09179v1 Magnetic properties and field-induced phenomena in the Jeff = 1/2 distorted kagome antiferromagnet (arXiv)

  8. 2407.09204v1 Electron bubbles in highly excited states of the lowest Landau level (arXiv)

  9. 2407.09211v1 Quantum-dot-based Kitaev chains: Majorana quality measures and scaling with increasing chain length (arXiv)

  10. 2407.09345v1 Reconfigurable Spin-Wave Properties in Two-Dimensional Magnonic Crystals Formed of Diamond and Triangular Shaped Nanomagnets (arXiv)

  11. 2407.09347v1 First-principles design of ambient-pressure MgxB2C2 and NaxBC superconductors (arXiv)

  12. 2407.09366v1 Kekule valence bond order in the honeycomb lattice optical Su-Schrieffer-Heeger Model and its relevance to Graphene (arXiv)

  13. 2407.09401v1 Taming spin susceptibilities in frustrated quantum magnets: Mean-field form and approximate nature of the quantum-to-classical correspondence (arXiv)

  14. 2407.09092v1 Diagnosing quantum transport from wave function snapshots (arXiv)

  15. 2407.09317v1 Bonding states underpinning structural transitions in IrTe2 observed with micro-ARPES (arXiv)

  16. 2407.09376v1 Ground-state properties of the double trillium lattice antiferromagnet KBaCr2(PO4)3 (arXiv)

  17. 2407.09456v1 Strain coupling of a single exciton to a nano-optomechanical resonator (arXiv)
